article_title: Democrats, Koch money fight for airwaves in Senate battlegrounds
article_text: Democrats and the Republican-friendly Koch brothers are locked in a vicious, multi-million-dollar slugfest whose battlegrounds extend from the floor of the U.S. Senate to the airwaves in several states that are key to this year’s congressional elections.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Democrats, Koch Brothers, Harry Reid, Alaska, North Carolina, Mark Begich, Kay Hagan
